thread.title: Bug Off Hosts 'Rat's in the Citi 2'
thread.title_full: Bug Off Hosts 'Rat's in the Citi 2'

title: Bug Off Hosts 'Rat's in the Citi 2'
text:
Subscribe Bug Off Hosts 'Rat's in the Citi 2' On Sept. 16, Bug Off Pest Control Center treated New York City area pest management professionals to a night of education, relaxation and baseball under the stars. September 21, 2015 
NEW YORK — On Sept. 16, New York City area pest management professionals were treated to a night of education, relaxation and baseball under the stars. Bug Off Pest Control Center held Rats and the Citi – Let’s Play 2! At Citi Field, home of the New York Mets. Liphatech’s John Murphy presented a riveting rodent control recertification workshop in Citi’s state-of-the-art Auditorium. Afterward, attendees assembled at the Party City Deck area for a night of unlimited food and drink as they watched the Mets play the Miami Marlins. In a pre-game ceremony, the Mets presented Bug Off with the business leader of the game Spirit Award, which was displayed for all to see on their brand-new jumbo tron. Next on Bug Off’s schedule of events is the 2015 New York Pest Expo on Veterans Day, Nov. 11, 2015. This year’s theme is in honor of women in pest management and will feature Dini Miller, Susan Jones, Nicky Gallagher, Cisse Spragins, and Faith Oi.
